name: Super ACiD Block Attack
summary: Super ACiD Block Attack is a puzzle game, probably one you have seen before. The idea is to try and make solid-horizontal rows using the pieces that are given to you. You can rotate the pieces before they fall down to the bottom of the screen. You can make more than 1 row at a time, but only up to five.
